name: Talk_Anna_Recruit
_source: speak;Anna;Welcome!|I'm Recruiter Anna, your friendly neighborhood Guildmaster!|Here you can recruit special units created by the community to join your army!
speak;Anna;These fighters come from all walks of life and bring unique abilities to your forces.|Just speak with me whenever you want to add new allies to your ranks!

speak;Anna;This is your first time here, so let me show you how it works.|A menu will appear and you can select a unit to recruit!|None of these units are canon, so don't worry about them messing with the lore!|They are also completely optional!|You can ignore this if you so desire.|Well, I'll let you handel it from here!
choice;NewRecruit;Choose a new unit to recruit;Davius;scroll_bar;backable
speak;Davius;I am Davius, mercenary of the eastern plains.|My blade seeks purpose, and I hear you lead a worthy cause.
speak;Eirika;We welcome your strength, Davius.|Our path is fraught with danger, but we fight for peace.
speak;Anna;Ooh, this one's got talent!|A swordsman with a lot to prove!|He'll be a valuable addition to your front lines, Eirika!
speak;Davius;I pledge my sword to your service.|My techniques may be unconventional, but they are effective.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Davius.|We'll be counting on you in the battles ahead.
